name: Hall of Legends
description: To avoid being erased from history forever, many risk their lives to become a Risen Legendâ€”a warrior recognized by the gods who birthed this world. Those who succeed are bestowed with unfathomable power and entrusted to represent the gods that chose them.

skinlines.name: Risen Legends
skinlines.description: Long ago, gods of myth sealed their strength within the four Shards of the Risen: Chaos, Harmony, Patience, and Vigor. Each presented a life-threatening trial to warriors who sought its power, promising to immortalize them in history. To this day, fighters across the land rise to the challenge in hopes of leaving a legacy that even a god will respect.
